Judul: SUATU STUDI TENTANG PEMBUATAN LAPISAN TIPIS KARBON DENGAN CARA IONISASI GAS METAN
Abstrak: Hydrogenated amorphous carbon films (a-C:H films) were prepared by plasma deposition from hydrocarbons. a-C:H films were deposited in a dc glow discharge from methane gas onto glass and KBr substrata. After deposition of the carbon film for the desired time, the deposits were studiedby-using ultroviolet and infrared spectrometer. The films show the properties, e.g optical transparancy in ultraviolet and infrared spectrometer, refractive indexs, thickness of coating and radicals. In this experiments the parameter treatment are vacuum pressure 0.1 Torr, flow rate of the methane gas 5.4827.10-2 1/s., two elektrodes 34.86 x 35.09 squares mm separated by 1 cm, 2 cm and 3 cm. Film lapisan tipis karbon dipersiapkan dengan deposisi plasma bahan hidrokarbon. Glow discharge dc digunakan untuk mendeposisikan film lapisan tipis tersebut. Setelah film lapisan tipis dihasilkan, maka deposit yang ada diselidiki dengan peralatan ultraviolet dan infra merah. Lapisan mempunyai sifat transparan, indeks bias, dan adanya sifat radikal dari species gas methane. Kata Kunci: Hydrogenated amorphous carbon films, methane gas
